org.apache.catalina.ha.tcp

类 SimpleTcpCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleBase
      • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleMBeanBase
        • org.apache.catalina.ha.tcp.SimpleTcpCluster
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.management.MBeanRegistration, Cluster, CatalinaCluster, IDynamicProperty, Lifecycle, LifecycleListener, ChannelListener, MembershipListener

    public class SimpleTcpCluster
extends LifecycleMBeanBase
implements CatalinaCluster, LifecycleListener, IDynamicProperty, MembershipListener, ChannelListener
    A Cluster implementation using simple multicast. Responsible for setting up a cluster and provides callers with a valid multicast receiver/sender. FIXME wrote testcases
    作者:
    Filip Hanik, Remy Maucherat, Peter Rossbach

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.catalina.Lifecycle

        Lifecycle.SingleUse

        protected java.lang.String getDomainInternal()
        从类复制的说明: LifecycleMBeanBase
        Method implemented by sub-classes to identify the domain in which MBeans should be registered.
        指定者:
        getDomainInternal 在类中 LifecycleMBeanBase
        返回:
        The name of the domain to use to register MBeans.

      • getObjectNameKeyProperties

        protected java.lang.String getObjectNameKeyProperties()
        从类复制的说明: LifecycleMBeanBase
        Allow sub-classes to specify the key properties component of the ObjectName that will be used to register this component.
        指定者:
        getObjectNameKeyProperties 在类中 LifecycleMBeanBase
        返回:
        The string representation of the key properties component of the desired ObjectName
